channel.title: Wildhunt Shifter needs to be updated
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wildhunt Shifter needs to be updated"

item.title: Re: Wildhunt Shifter needs to be updated
item.content:encoded: Also made some changes myself! The Wayfinder version and the Rising from the last war version have seperate entries, due to their different abilities.

item.title: Re: Wildhunt Shifter needs to be updated
item.content:encoded: thanks for finding that! the wildhunt entry on that page has been updated

item.title: Wildhunt Shifter needs to be updated
item.content:encoded: The Wildhunt Shifter subrace has its source listed as Eberron Rising from the Last War but it is actually the version from Wayfinders Guide to Eberron. The Eberron Rising from the Last War version still needs to be added.
